name: secure-download-module
description: skynet kernel module to securely download files from skynet

scripts.deps-1: npm install libkmodule@latest && npm install libskynet@latest
scripts.deps-2: npm run deps-1 && npm install libskynetnode@latest
scripts.lint: npm run deps-2 && npm run prettier && npm run eslint
scripts.compile: npm run lint && tsc && npm run rollup
scripts.build-prep: npm run compile && npm run make-build-script && npm run move-dist
